actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of reasonable attorneys' fees in certain cases of civil actions brought against State and local law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of reasonable attorneys' fees to a prevailing defendant in civil actions relating to the deprivation of civil rights brought against State and local law enforcement officers.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of reasonable attorneys' fees in certain cases of civil actions brought against State and local law enforcement officers.
